=== We're Having a PARTY! ===

==== RSVP ====
<nowiki>[[http://www.meetup.com/ubuntuvancouver/calendar/9989256/|Please RSVP here!]]</nowiki>

==== WHY ====
To celebrate the the newest greatest Ubuntu release yet:
<<BR>>'''9.04 Jaunty Jackalope'''

==== WHAT ====
* Refreshments
* Socializing
* CD's with the new release
* People who are passionate about Ubuntu!

* Those with Ubuntu logo clothing are encouraged to wear it! 
* '''Bonus Points''': Wear antler headbands as tribute to the mythical Jackalope.
* For those with cameras, please bring them for our Flickr photostream. 

==== WHEN ====
Friday April 24 2009 at 7:00pm

==== WHERE ====
 '''The Hackery'''
 <<BR>>304 Victoria Drive
 <<BR>>Vancouver
 <<BR>><nowiki>[[http://thehackery.ca/]]</nowiki>
